name: part_011
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY1】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [cB-gslGpCO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs her high-energy song 'Beyond' on stage with a vibrant, star-themed background and enthusiastic crowd participation.

MC section following the performance. Sora greets the audience with her signature 'Kon-some!' and engages in a call-and-response with different sections of the crowd, including boys, girls, overseas fans, and the underage section.

subtitles.original: 飛び込んで　地球上　混ぜ混ぜして　何度でもハジけちゃえ
subtitles.english: Dive in, on this Earth, mix it all up, and burst out as many times as you like!

subtitles.original: Beyond　パパッパ
subtitles.english: Beyond papappa

subtitles.original: Beyond　時代はぐるり回る
subtitles.english: Beyond, the times go round and round

subtitles.original: Beyond　ハジメタ　時代想像して
subtitles.english: Beyond, it's started, imagine the times

subtitles.original: さあ　時代の波へ
subtitles.english: Come on, to the wave of the times

subtitles.original: さあ　色の波へ
subtitles.english: Come on, to the wave of colors

subtitles.original: さあ　無限大の可能性
subtitles.english: Come on, to infinite possibilities

subtitles.original: 超えてけ
subtitles.english: Go beyond!

subtitles.original: それで Happy　全速力　混ぜ混ぜして　いつまでもダンス中
subtitles.english: Then Happy, at full speed, mix it all up, dancing forever

subtitles.original: そのまま　体中踊れ踊れ
subtitles.english: Just like that, let your whole body dance, dance

subtitles.original: それで Happy　めぐりくる　混ぜ混ぜして　お友達
subtitles.english: Then Happy, coming around, mix it all up, my friend

subtitles.original: いつもハジけるよ
subtitles.english: Always bursting out

subtitles.original: ラララララ　ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la...

subtitles.original: 輝くのさ　全部ハジけちゃえ
subtitles.english: Gonna shine, let it all burst out

subtitles.original: ラララララ　ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la...

subtitles.original: 輝き溢れ出す　ステップ踏んで　ダンス中
subtitles.english: Sparkle overflows, stepping along, in the middle of a dance

subtitles.original: ラララララ　ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la...

subtitles.original: 共鳴する　情熱をぶつけ合えば
subtitles.english: If we clash our resonating passion

subtitles.original: Beyond　ラリラリ
subtitles.english: Beyond rarirari

subtitles.original: 飛び込む　テクニカルバイブ
subtitles.english: Diving in, technical vibe

subtitles.original: Beyond　ライハッパ
subtitles.english: Beyond raihappa

subtitles.original: それで Happy　もっとさらに打ち明けて　魅せるユニバース
subtitles.english: Then Happy, open up even more, a universe to show

subtitles.original: Beyond　パパッパ
subtitles.english: Beyond papappa

subtitles.original: 一人じゃいけないところまで
subtitles.english: To a place I can't reach alone

subtitles.original: 見て　見て　震えるぜ
subtitles.english: Look, look, it's shivering

subtitles.original: 見ていてね！
subtitles.english: Keep watching!

subtitles.original: さあ　時代を超えて
subtitles.english: Come on, across the ages

subtitles.original: さあ　希望の声
subtitles.english: Come on, the voice of hope

subtitles.original: さあ　巡り続ける時を
subtitles.english: Come on, the time that continues to go around

subtitles.original: 超えてけ
subtitles.english: Go beyond!

subtitles.original: それで Happy　エネルギーと君との目　一生
subtitles.english: Then Happy, energy and our eyes meeting, for a lifetime

subtitles.original: 目に見えない夢ここに秘めて
subtitles.english: Hidden here is a dream invisible to the eye

subtitles.original: 爆上がり　始まった
subtitles.english: Bursting up, it's started

subtitles.original: 永遠の輝きへ
subtitles.english: Towards eternal brilliance

subtitles.original: それで Happy　全速力　混ぜ混ぜして　いつまでもダンス中
subtitles.english: Then Happy, at full speed, mix it all up, dancing forever

subtitles.original: そのまま　体中踊れ踊れ
subtitles.english: Just like that, let your whole body dance, dance

subtitles.original: それで Happy　めぐりくる　混ぜ混ぜして　お友達
subtitles.english: Then Happy, coming around, mix it all up, my friend

subtitles.original: いつもハジけるよ
subtitles.english: Always bursting out

subtitles.original: ラララララ　ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la...

subtitles.original: 輝くのさ　全部ハジけちゃえ
subtitles.english: Gonna shine, let it all burst out

subtitles.original: ラララララ　ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la...

subtitles.original: 輝き溢れ出す　ステップ踏んで　ダンス中
subtitles.english: Sparkle overflows, stepping along, in the middle of a dance

subtitles.original: ラララララ　ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la...

subtitles.original: おーおおー
subtitles.english: Ohh oh-ohh

subtitles.original: ラララララ　ラララララ
subtitles.english: La la la la la...

subtitles.original: それで Happy　輝きへ　ダンス中
subtitles.english: Then Happy, towards brilliance, in the middle of a dance

subtitles.original: はい！みんな！こんそめー！
subtitles.english: Hi! Everyone! Kon-some-!

subtitles.original: みんなの声が大きすぎて、オケが聞こえないレベルの大歓声、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone's voices were so loud, it was a roar of cheers to the point I couldn't hear the backing track. Thank you!

subtitles.original: ちょっと、一回聞いておこうかな？にゃー！にゃー！
subtitles.english: I think I'll listen for a moment. Meow! Meow!

subtitles.original: ということで、一年半ぶりのソラパなんですけど...
subtitles.english: So, this is the first SoraPa in a year and a half...

subtitles.original: ちょっと恒例のやつ、あ、やってもいい？
subtitles.english: Can I do that usual thing? Ah, is it okay?

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: って言うんで、「はーい」とか言ってください。いきますよ！
subtitles.english: I'll say that, so please say "Hi" or something. Here we go!

subtitles.original: 男の子ー！
subtitles.english: Boys!

subtitles.original: ちょっと、恥ずかしいかもしれない、ちょっと手だけ振ってもいいよ。
subtitles.english: It might be a bit embarrassing, so you can just wave your hand if you like.

subtitles.original: 女の子ー！
subtitles.english: Girls!

subtitles.original: 声聞こえた、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: I heard your voices, thank you!

subtitles.original: 海外の方ー！
subtitles.english: People from overseas!

subtitles.original: すごい！そして、えーっと...
subtitles.english: Amazing! And, um...

subtitles.original: 「めちゃ遠くから来たよ」って人！絶対自分が一番遠い、みたいな人、いる？
subtitles.english: People who said "I came from really far away!" Is there anyone who's definitely the farthest?

subtitles.original: あ、でも海外の方かな？ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Ah, but maybe it's the overseas fans? Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: そして、そうだね、未成年席の方ー！
subtitles.english: And, let's see, the underage section!

subtitles.original: いえーい！ありがとうございます。では、みんなで行くよ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you very much. Now, let's do it with everyone!

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: こっち側ー！
subtitles.english: This side!

subtitles.original: こっち側ー！
subtitles.english: This side!

subtitles.original: 最後に、全員ー！
subtitles.english: Finally, everyone!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！はい、これね、これがやりたかったんだ、ずっと。へへ。
subtitles.english: Thank you! Yes, this, I've wanted to do this for a long time. Hehe.
